Summary Note:
Moens Goossens Smets and the RM met at a networking event in Brussels. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Moens Goossens Smets is a 44 year old Editor from Belgium.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Moens Goossens Smets and Louise tied the knot in 2009. Their children are named Maes and Ingrid.
Education Background:
In 2000, Moens graduated from Institut Saint-Joseph with a secondary school diploma.
Moens completed his university education at Acad√©mie des Beaux-Arts de Tournai in 2005.
Occupation History:
Moens Goossens Smets is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of experience.
Moens Goossens Smets began his professional journey as a Journalist at Vlaamse Radio- en Televisieomroeporganisatie (VRT) in 2005, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Editor at De Persgroep NV in 2008, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 330000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has villa located in Antwerp, worth 1800000 EUR.


Following the passing of his grandfather, a successful Oil and Gas Executive, he received an inheritance of 7710000 EUR in 2014, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Moens as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
